info.title: ILG WMS Schema documentation.
info.description:
ILG WMS API V2.0 - Provides the capability to integrate with ILG's warehouse management system.
The API accepts the Request in JSON format and if the request is validated the API responds back with a correlation id.

Authentication is achieved using an API key which will need to be requested from [ILG Support](mailto:itsupport@ilguk.com)

Supporting Documentation links:

[Mapping Template](https://github.com/Jitterbit-EMEA/ilg-documentation/blob/master/supporting_docs/)

[Available Interfaces](https://github.com/Jitterbit-EMEA/ilg-documentation/tree/master/supporting_docs/)

post.summary: Create new receipts from ASN or PO records

get.description: returns stock records using wms accountID

Add1.description: Address Line 1 Required (RM has a limit of 35, DPD limit of 30)

Add2.description: Address Line 2  Usually included but not required

Country.description: Country name in Full (Not required but usually included)

CountryCode.description: 2 character ISO County code (Required) e.g GB

Email.description: Email Required if Address Type = SHIP

Firstname.description: First Name Required if Address Type = SHIP

Lastname.description: Last Name Required if Address Type = SHIP

State.description: State/County (Should be 2 letter state code for USA address)

Brand.description: Single ILG Customer can have multiple brands that might require specific operational treatment

FValue.description: Data value - entered as string but validated as required by DataType

Channel.description: Order Source from the ILG Customer's perspective (ShopEU,ShopUK,NetSuite)

CorrelationID.description: INTERNAL FOR ILG USE DO NOT POPULATE

DDP.description: Intl Deliveries only  Default 0 -duties paid local customs reponse, or 1 -Duty paid at point of booking (WHERE POSSIBLE)

EntityID.description: ILG Use, Copy of field that uniquely identifies this record. E.g., OrderNumber

Notes.description: Optional order comment field,  Exception to normal order processing)

AltLineID.description: Alternate/Secondary line - Sometimes required for BTB or EDI orders

FValue.description: Data value - entered as string but validated as required by DataType

LineNumber.description: Linenumber from Sales order, this is Usually unique for the customer and needs to be if later editing is required via API

OtherLineTotal.description: Other Line Value (Qty x OtherUnit Price)

OtherUnitPrice.description: For customs E.g. where sales price is 0 but customs declaration <>0

ProductID.description: Product (SKU) must match Master data primary product in WMS

SalesUnitPrice.description: Sales Line Unit Price (Multiplied by Qty to give SalesLinetotal - Values in SalesCurr)

UoM.description: Mainly for wholesale could be Each, Inner, Outer, Pack

OrdNumber.description: Primary customer ordernumber (should be unique from the customer's viewpoint) UPPER

OrdRef1.description: Additional fixed customer order reference field

OrdRef2.description: Additional fixed customer order reference field

OrdRef3.description: Additional fixed customer order reference field

OrdType.description: Type of Order, E.g. SO (Sales order)  TO (Outbound Transfer Order)

OtherCurr.description: Currency for Insurance and OTHER Values on the order (E.g., Customs Value) UPPER ISO

RetailID.description: Usually for BTB Customer to identify regular delivery customers that may require specific handling/Ops procedures (ECOM, ASOS)

SalesValue.description: Sales Value (usually the sum of SalesLineTotals from order lines)

Service.description: Shipping Service level Eg.   NextDay  Sameday, IntlExpress, IntlRoad

Summary.description: Summary order header info (E.g., Order level summary of goods for customs)

Brand.description: Single ILG Customer can have multiple brands that might require specific operational treatment

CorrelationID.description: INTERNAL FOR ILG USE DO NOT POPULATE

EntityID.description: ILG Use, Copy of field that uniquely identifies this record. E.g., OrderNumber

PrdID.description: Product (SKU) must match Master data primary product in WMS

EachQty.description: Each Quantity Shipped within listed Package

SSCC.description: For Future use when linking Despatch line/Sku comb to Package

OrdNumber.description: Primary customer ordernumber (should be unique from the customer's viewpoint) UPPER

OrdRef1.description: Additional fixed customer order reference field

OrdRef2.description: Additional fixed customer order reference field

OrdRef3.description: Additional fixed customer order reference field

OrdType.description: Type of Order, E.g. SO (Sales order)  TO (Outbound Transfer Order)

Qty.description: Total number of items within a consigment

RetailID.description: Usually for BTB Customer to identify regular delivery customers that may require specific handling/Ops procedures (ECOM, ASOS)

Service.description: Dispatched service (may NOT match original request)

TrackingNumber.description: Carrier Tracking Number (ONLY Parent tracking number)

FValue.description: Data value - entered as string but validated as required by DataType

CorrelationID.description: INTERNAL FOR ILG USE DO NOT POPULATE

EntityID.description: ILG Use, Copy of field that uniquely identifies this record. E.g., OrderNumber

ExpDelDate.description: Expected Delivery Date (Used as default for all lines unless LineDelDate specified)

AltLineID.description: Alternate/Secondary line - Sometimes required for BTB or EDI orders

BatchID.description: Mostly not known at point of order, but may be used if pre-known batches due to arrive

FValue.description: Data value - entered as string but validated as required by DataType

LineNumber.description: Linenumber from GoodsIns order, this is Usually unique for the customer and needs to be if later editing is required via API

LineDelDate.description: IF PO, expected delivery dates at line level, if ASN, this is blank as date is set at header level

PrdStatus.description: Product status on receipt (Usually Good for new Stock)

PrdLife.description: Life Days, For products that have a shelf life. This ovverides the default in master data.  Missing or 0 to use masterdata default

ProductID.description: Product (SKU) must match Master data primary product in WMS

ProductionDate.description: Used for products that have a shelf life to calculate expiry date

UoM.description: Usually Each, but could be Inner, Outer  (We will select Inners or outers as part of the warehouse process as appropriate)

Notes.description: Optional order comment field,  Exception to normal order processing

OrdRef1.description: Additional fixed customer order reference field

OrdRef2.description: Additional fixed customer order reference field

OrdRef3.description: Additional fixed customer order reference field

OrdType.description: ASN, PO can be split into multiple ASNs with separate expected dates

FValue.description: Data value - entered as string but validated as required by DataType

CorrelationID.description: INTERNAL FOR ILG USE DO NOT POPULATE

EntityID.description: ILG Use, Copy of field that uniquely identifies this record. E.g., OrderNumber

AltLineID.description: Alternate/Secondary line - Sometimes required for BTB or EDI orders

BatchID.description: Mostly not known at point of order, but may be used if pre-known batches due to arrive

FValue.description: Data value - entered as string but validated as required by DataType

LineNumber.description: Linenumber from GoodsIns order, this is Usually unique for the customer and needs to be if later editing is required via API

LineRecDate.description: IF PO, Rec delivery dates at line level, if ASN, this is blank as date is set at header level

PrdStatus.description: Product status on receipt (Usually Good for new Stock)

PrdLife.description: Life Days, For products that have a shelf life. This ovverides the default in master data.  Missing or 0 to use masterdata default

ProductID.description: Product (SKU) must match Master data primary product in WMS

ProductionDate.description: Used for products that have a shelf life to calculate expiry date

EachQty.description: Inbound EACH qty (differs from Qty if UoM<>EACH

UoM.description: Usually Each, but could be Inner, Outer  (We will select Inners or outers as part of the warehouse process as appropriate)

Notes.description: Optional order comment field,  Exception to normal order processing)

OrdRef1.description: Additional fixed customer order reference field

OrdRef2.description: Additional fixed customer order reference field

OrdRef3.description: Additional fixed customer order reference field

OrdType.description: ASN, PO can be split into multiple ASNs with separate expected dates

Alias1.description: Alternative Product Identifiers (Optional must be agreed with ILG before use)

Alias2.description: Alternative Product Identifiers (Optional must be agreed with ILG before use)

BatchPrd.description: 1 if Items require a batch codes when added to stock, default 0 (1=yes)

HazardPrd.description: 1 if product is 'Hazardous' and needs additional hazard classification on improt

Brand.description: Single ILG Customer can have multiple brands that might require specific operational treatment

Category1.description: Agreed list, populates drop down in target system

Commodity.description: Req for PrdType=STOCK UK Export Commodity Code

Cost.description: Unit Cost Price - Default value if not incuded on SO LINE

DiscDate.description: Date at which Product is Discontinued (Set to a long time in the future by default)

ExpirePrd.description: 1 if items within batch have an expiry date (Production date and Expiry days set on import)

LongDesc.example: Faux Leather Clutch bag Green (xxl 3 extra pockets)

PrdLife.description: For products with ExpirePrd=1, this is the Default life in days used to Calc Expiry Date

PrdStatus.description: Product Status: Active, Suspended (Can't be picked for sales but can be for WH transfers),Discontinued (No transactions)

PrdType.description: Product type, Stock Item,KIT (Using KitGrp Ref) Consumable, Virtual Product

ProductID.description: Product (SKU) which must match the Master data primary product in WMS

ReqType.description: Request type NEW, new product, UPD to update existing

SerialPrd.description: 1 if items are imported with unqiue Serial Numbers when added to stock, Default 0

ShortDesc.description: Short Product description (appears on most SKU related screens in WNS)

CorrelationID.description: INTERNAL FOR ILG USE DO NOT POPULATE

EntityID.description: ILG Use, Copy of field that uniquely identifies this record. E.g., ProductID

FValue.description: Data value - entered as string but validated as required by DataType

KitPrdID.description: Kit Product ID, Products must exist and NOT be of type KIT.

KitQTY.description: Qty of PrdID within parent kit

CorrelationID.description: INTERNAL FOR ILG USE DO NOT POPULATE

EntityID.description: ILG Use, Copy of field that uniquely identifies this record. E.g., OrderNumber

MoveType.description: Determines the type of Movement e.g. Adjustment, Movement, Disposal

FValue.description: Data value - entered as string but validated as required by DataType

Class.description: Class of Returns Service values WHSRTN or WS will set a Wholesale class, all others will be set to Customer class

CorrelationID.description: INTERNAL FOR ILG USE DO NOT POPULATE

EntityID.description: ILG Use, Copy of field that uniquely identifies this record. E.g., OrderNumber

AltLineID.description: Alternate/Secondary line - Sometimes required for BTB or EDI orders

BatchID.description: Mostly not known upfront, so optional

FValue.description: Data value - entered as string but validated as required by DataType

LineNumber.description: Linenumber from Sales order, this is Usually unique for the customer and needs to be if later editing is required via API

LineDelDate.description: IF PO, expected delivery dates at line level, if ASN, this is blank as date is set at header level

PrdStatus.description: Product Status on Import (Could be QA for Returns, usually GOOD for ASN)

ProductID.description: Product (SKU) must match Master data primary product in WMS

ProductionDate.description: Used for products that have a shelf life to calculate expiry date

ILGRef.description: Internal ILG WMS generated OrderNumber for original GoodsOut Order

OrdNumber.description: Customer ID for returns order UPPER
